secure:
(:action secure_machine
    :parameters (?m - machine)
    :precondition (and
                    (machine ?m)
                    (not (secured ?m)))
    :effect (secured ?m)
)

;; Action 2: Set up virtual machines
(:action get_authorization
    :parameters (?t - target)
    :precondition (and
                    (target ?t)
                    (not (authorized ?t)))
    :effect (authorized ?t)
)

;; Action 4: Set up laboratory
learn:
(:action learn_internet_html
    :parameters (?p - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (knows-internet-html ?p))
                    (has-access-to-computer ?p))
    :effect (knows-internet-html ?p)
)
```

#### Action 2: Acquire Unix System
```lisp
(:action learn_unix
    :parameters (?p - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (has-unix-system ?p)
                    (not (knows-unix ?p)))
    :effect (knows-unix ?p)
)
```

#### Action 4: Understand Hacking
```lisp
(:action learn_programming
    :parameters (?p - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (knows-programming ?p))
                    (has-access-to-computer ?p))
    :effect (knows-programming ?p)
)
```

#### Action 6: Understand Ethics of Hacking
```lisp
(:action acquire_unix_system
    :parameters (?p - person ?s - system)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (has-unix-system ?p))
                    (open-source ?s)
                    (unix-based ?s))
    :effect (has-unix-system ?p)
)
```

#### Action 3: Learn Unix
```lisp
understand:
(:action understand_ethics_of_hacking
    :parameters (?p - person)
    :precondition (not (understands-ethics-hacking ?p))
    :effect (understands-ethics-hacking ?p)
)
```

These actions reflect the steps involved in the task "hacking1_1" based on the descriptions provided. Each action has been structured to include parameters, preconditions, and effects, capturing the learning and acquisition processes necessary for hacking skills, as well as understanding the ethical implications.
setup:
(:action setup_virtual_machines
    :parameters (?vm - virtual_machine)
    :precondition (and
                    (secured ?m)
                    (not (setup ?vm)))
    :effect (setup ?vm)
)
